name: CompanyGame
0:
”Alexa, open Company Game.”
”The Company is Microsoft.”
”Please start.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: company game
des: This game is similar to the game of Atlas, except that it is about, all the Multinational Companies of the world, instead of countries, continents and cities of the world. This is a single player game, in which a person plays with Alexa, until either the person loses the game or Alexa. This increases one knowledge about the various multinational companies and brands of the world.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
